co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

Class GalleryDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery.GalleryDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gallery

    public class GalleryDefault
extends java.lang.Object
implements Gallery
    Manages the images and thumbnails to support production of a gallery. Also manages creation of the HTML for a gallery. Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: thomassecondary Date: 01/07/2012 Time: 17:59 To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.

      Generates and returns the HTML used to display this gallery

      Returns a List containing one GalleryImage object for each image being managed within the gallery.

      Returns the string which is the name of the gallery (and folder where images are stored).

      This method will work out whether the gallery has been modified in a way which means it should be re-initialised.
      void updateGallery()
      Instructs the gallery to refresh its data, including: - List of images and information about images - Thumbnails - HTML

      • isModified

        public boolean isModified()
        This method will work out whether the gallery has been modified in a way which means it should be re-initialised. In practice we are looking for: - Any of the existing images changing - Any of the images missing (i.e. have been deleted) - Any new images.
        Specified by:
        isModified in interface Gallery
        Returns:
